text:
Hey Aditya!
Mere wingie, mere bhai. you are such a humble person. I always found you supportive for me. Mere birthday wale din jab tumne meri ek random photo click karke upload ki thi..tumhe nahi pata wo kitna special the mere liye. mere bithday ko leke wo pahla post tha...maine kabhi use expect hi nhi kiya tha.
Aur wo triple room wali bakchodiyan bhai!! GBM ke pahle khud ko lock karwa lenağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Ummeed karunga bhai hum jald hi milenge!
Always keep in touch bro!
Stay safe!
author: Ramji  Gupta

text:
Hey Ananya! You are very helpful in nature. Thanks for your 100 at Hall 13 canteen. TA201 wala group bhi kaafi yaadgaar raha. Tumhi ne mera RAAMLAAL naam failaya tha.ğŸ˜‚.
Stay safe! and keep in touch!
author: Ramji  Gupta

text:
Hey Archit!! Hamara ubharta hua photographer, jab bhi apan milte the hamesha "Ram Ram" se baatein start karte the. Yeh hamesha mujhe mere naam ki alag feeling deta tha...I miss that bro badly!..Ummeed hai jald hi mulaqaat hogi. Stay safe! keep in touch!
"JAI SHREE RAM"
author: Ramji  Gupta

text:
Heyyy Ram! College aane se pahle mujhe laga tha ki mere naam se main akela banda hunga....lekin fir tum dikhe. Exactly mujhe bhi yaad nahi ki hamara interaction kab hua...lekin bhai bhai bhai!!! Antaragni ki wo raat..khoob bakchodiya kari thi tab ghoom ghoom ke...(" bhai dekh wo tujhe hi dekh rahi hai..maine khud dekha hai"). Uske baad wo random group ke saath dumb scharades â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
Hameha touch me rahna.
"RAM RAM"
author: Ramji  Gupta

text:
Yo buddy!
Urfs- Dhaula, Singhxu, slowmo
Ek aisa banda jisse main har moment pe inspire hua hun. Tum hamesha hi kaafi supportive rahe ho. Jab kisi se mujhe koi ummed nhi bachti thi to tumne hamesha aage aake meri help kari...exam se pahle raat me baitha ke jo mujhe MTH101, PHY102 padha kar paas karane se lekar college ke  last day tak....aur abhi tak bhi...uske liye kya bolu ab..
Bohot se aise moments hai likhne ke liye...gin ke bhi likhunga to bhi kam pad jayenge.
Aise hi hamesha sabke liye supportive rahna.
Aur han...use #Ramji_Gupta for any jugaadğŸ˜‰ darwaje bayen aur khulengeğŸ˜‚
author: Ramji  Gupta
